summary.span: 提供与 Visual Basic 6.0 之间的兼容性，使您可以使用 Microsoft ActiveX 数据对象 () 创建到数据库的连接。

span.span: Provides compatibility with the Visual Basic 6.0 , which enabled you to create a connection to a database using Microsoft ActiveX Data Objects ().

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级的应用程序中使用此控件以继续使用 `ADO` 数据连接。Use this control in applications upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0 to continue to use an `ADO` data connection. 对于新开发，应考虑使用 `ADO.NET` 而不是 `ADO`。For new development, you should consider using `ADO.NET` instead of `ADO`. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ADO.NET 与 ADO 的比较](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2008/904fck4k(v=vs.90))。For more information, see [Comparison of ADO.NET and ADO](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2008/904fck4k(v=vs.90)). > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此指针有效，则 `BOF` 和 返回值由当前行指针的位置确定。The `BOF` and return values are determined by the location of the current row pointer if this pointer is valid. 如果 `BOF` 或 `true`，则没有当前行，任何引用 数据的尝试都将导致异常。If either `BOF` or is `true`, there is no current row, and any attempt to reference data causes an exception. 您可以使用 "`BOF`" 和 "" 属性来确定 对象是否包含行，或在从行移到行时是否超出 的限制。You can use the `BOF` and properties to determine whether an object contains rows or whether you have gone beyond the limits of an as you move from row to row. > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

summary.span: 获取或设置当前 在本地内存中缓存的记录数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of records that are cached in local memory for the current .

value.span: 一个 ，指定当前 对象在本地内存中缓存的记录数。

span.span: An that specifies the number of records that are cached in local memory for the current object.

value.span: 默认值为 50 个记录。

span.span: The default is 50 records.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `CacheSize` 值告知提供程序要在其缓冲区中保留多少条记录以及要在本地内存中一次提取多少条记录。The `CacheSize` value tells the provider how many records to keep in its buffer and how many records to fetch at one time to local memory. 例如，设置为10时，在打开第一个 后，提供程序将前10条记录提取到本地内存中。For example, when set to 10, after opening the first , the provider fetches the first 10 records into local memory. 因此，当您向前移动当前记录时，提供程序将从本地内存缓冲区返回数据值。Therefore, as you move forward from the current record, the provider returns the data values from the local memory buffer. 一旦移过最后一条记录，接下来的10条记录就会从数据源提取到缓存中。As soon as you move past the last record, the next 10 records are fetched from the data source into the cache. 虽然您可以在游标生存期内更改值，但更改仅影响在下一次从数据源提取数据后缓存中的记录数。While you can change value during the life of the cursor, the change only affects the number of records in the cache after the next fetch from the data source. > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由 public `Dispose()` 方法和 方法调用。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护的 `Dispose(Boolean)` 方法，并将释放参数设置为 `true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the disposing parameter set to `true`. 调用释放参数设置为 `false``Dispose`。 invokes `Dispose` with the disposing parameter set to `false`. 当释放参数 `true`时，此方法将释放该控件引用的任何托管对象所持有的所有资源。When the disposing parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this control references. 此方法将调用每个被引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object. > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
